summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Dynamic Sports & Bonus Authority Network with AI performance-based ranking system. All 8 real bonus sites are properly displayed, AI ranking system is functional, performance tracking is integrated, and admin panel features are working correctly.

flaky_endpoints.symptoms: 422 error due to request format issue
flaky_endpoints.workaround: Fixed during testing - needed proper request structure

design_issues.issue: Homepage shows only 2 bonus cards instead of all 8 sites
design_issues.note: Full site list is available on dedicated /deneme-bonusu page with proper AI ranking

passed_tests: Backend API: All 8 real bonus sites (MAXWIN, HILTONBET, ELEXBET, FESTWIN, CASINO DIOR, BETCI, ALFABAHIS, TULIPBET)
AI Ranking Report: Returns sites sorted by performance_score with heuristic scoring
AI Update Rankings: Manual ranking trigger endpoint functional (200 response)
Performance Tracking: All event types (impression, cta_click, affiliate_click, scroll, time_on_page) working
Batch Tracking: Multiple events tracked successfully
Bonus Sites Display: All 8 real sites visible on /deneme-bonusu page
AI Performance Ranking: Sites properly ranked (#1 ELEXBET, #2 TULIPBET, etc.)
'Öne Çıkan' Badges: Top 2 sites correctly marked as featured
Rank Numbers: Sites display proper rank indicators (#1, #2, #3, etc.)
Turnover Requirements: Çevrim şartı properly displayed on all bonus cards
CTA Buttons: 'SİTEYE GİT' buttons functional and visible for all sites
Admin Panel Performance Tab: AI ranking system interface working
Admin Panel SEO Tab: Competitor analysis, keyword gap, weekly report features present
Performance Tracking Integration: Session tracking and analytics infrastructure available
AI Content Generation: GPT-5.2 integration working for articles and match summaries
SEO AI Endpoints: Competitor analysis, weekly reports generating properly
Database Seeding: All 8 real sites properly seeded with correct data
CRUD Operations: Create, read, update, delete operations working for sites and articles
action_item_for_main_agent: Homepage display optimization: Consider showing more than 2 bonus cards on homepage or add clear navigation to full site list. The dedicated bonus page (/deneme-bonusu) works perfectly with all features.
